short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Short cut typing of emoji. Follows the convesion of http://www.emoji-cheat-sheet.com/ for all input fields.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Short cut typing of emoji. Follows the convesion of http://www.emoji-cheat-sheet.com/ for all input fields. Must have OS X version >= 10.9. On Linux you mush install ttf-ancient-fonts. Have not tested on windows.
